title: Venture Capitalist Doug Leone Highlights AI as the Defining Investment of the Next Two Decades
description: In a recent conversation, renowned venture capitalist Doug Leone underscored Artificial Intelligence (AI) as the paramount investment avenue for the next 20 years.
